pages.text: $(marked)Hysteria$() is an essential rite to most Entheators.$(br)It is usually cast as a $(l:miskatonicmysteries:rites/rite_intro#triggered_rite)$(t:Triggered Rites)$(marked)triggered rite$(), and invokes a strong $(marked)mania$() in anyone near it, commonly used as a precedent for other Rites.
Definitely make sure to cast this while sneaking, so as to not accidentally start it normally.
